T.query: select sod.salesorderid, sod.salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail sod join salesorderheader soh on sod.salesorderid = soh.salesorderid join creditcard cc on soh.creditcardid = cc.creditcardid where ( sod.orderqty >1 and sod.unitprice >500 and sod.unitpricediscount >0 ) or (soh.subtotal > 120000  and soh.freight > 3500) or (soh.revisionnumber=9 and soh.status =5 and soh.territoryid =5) or (cc.cardtype='ColonialVoice' and cc.expyear > 2007 and cc.expmonth > 6);

F.query: select sod.salesorderid, sod.salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail sod join salesorderheader soh on sod.salesorderid = soh.salesorderid join creditcard cc on soh.creditcardid = cc.creditcardid where ( sod.orderqty >1 and sod.unitprice >100 and sod.unitpricediscount >0 ) or (soh.subtotal > 120000  and soh.freight > 3500) or (soh.revisionnumber=9 and soh.status =5 and soh.territoryid =5) or (cc.cardtype='ColonialVoice' and cc.expyear > 2007 and cc.expmonth > 6);

select sod.salesorderid, sod.salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail sod join salesorderheader soh on sod.salesorderid = soh.salesorderid join creditcard cc on soh.creditcardid = cc.creditcardid where ( sod.orderqty >1 and sod.unitprice >500 and sod.unitpricediscount >0 ) or (soh.subtotal > 120000  and soh.freight > 3500) or (soh.revisionnumber=9 and soh.status =5 and soh.territoryid =5) or (cc.cardtype='ColonialVoice' and cc.expyear > 2007 and cc.expmonth = 6);

select sod.salesorderid, sod.salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail sod join salesorderheader soh on sod.salesorderid = soh.salesorderid join creditcard cc on soh.creditcardid = cc.creditcardid where ( sod.orderqty >1 and sod.unitprice >500 and sod.unitpricediscount >0 ) or (soh.totaldue > 120000  and soh.freight > 3500) or (soh.revisionnumber=9 and soh.status =5 and soh.territoryid =5) or (cc.cardtype='ColonialVoice' and cc.expyear > 2007 and cc.expmonth > 6);

select sod.salesorderid, sod.salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail sod join salesorderheader soh on sod.salesorderid = soh.salesorderid join creditcard cc on soh.creditcardid = cc.creditcardid where ( sod.unitprice >500 and sod.unitpricediscount >0 ) or (soh.subtotal > 120000  and soh.freight > 3500) or (soh.revisionnumber=9 and soh.status =5 and soh.territoryid =5) or (cc.cardtype='ColonialVoice' and cc.expyear > 2007 and cc.expmonth > 6);

select sod.salesorderid, sod.salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail sod join salesorderheader soh on sod.salesorderid = soh.salesorderid join creditcard cc on soh.creditcardid = cc.creditcardid where ( sod.unitprice >500 and sod.unitpricediscount >0 ) or (soh.subtotal > 120000  and soh.freight > 4000) or (soh.revisionnumber=9 and soh.status =5 and soh.territoryid =5) or (cc.cardtype='ColonialVoice' and cc.expyear = 2008 and cc.expmonth = 6);

select sod.salesorderid, sod.salesorderdetailid from salesorderdetail sod join salesorderheader soh on sod.salesorderid = soh.salesorderid join creditcard cc on soh.creditcardid = cc.creditcardid where ( sod.orderqty >1 and sod.unitprice >500 and sod.unitpricediscount >0 ) or (soh.subtotal > 120000  and soh.freight > 3500 and sod.orderqty >1) or (soh.revisionnumber=9 and soh.status =5 and soh.territoryid =5 ) or (cc.cardtype='ColonialVoice' and cc.expyear > 2007 and cc.expmonth > 6);
